title: Megaversal RPGs (Including TMNT, Rifts, & Palladium Fantasy)
description:
This is a torrent of Megaversal RPGs, containing these RPGs:

* After the Bomb
* Beyond the Supernatural
* Dead Reign
* Fantasy
* Palladium Fantasy
* Heroes Unlimited
* Macross II
* Nightbane
* Ninjas & Superspies
* Rifts (Complete upto/including World Book 32 and Revised World Book 1)
* Robotech
* Splicers
* Systems Failure
* Mechanoid Invasion
* TMNT & Other Strangeness
* Valley of Pharaohs

This torrent does not include The Rifter or RECON. If anyone wants them, I may upload those torrents as well.

All files were scanned with Microsoft Security Essentials and AVG 2014.
